summary.Title: Dishwasher / cleaning staff to Cofoco restaurants
summary.JobHeadline: Dishwasher / cleaning staff to Cofoco restaurants
summary.Presentation: We are looking for solid and stable dishwashers and cleaning staff to work at our restaurants in permanent and temporary jobs. Our restaurants are primarily placed in the city center of Copenhagen,

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Dishwasher / cleaning staff to Cofoco restaurants
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for solid and stable dishwashers and cleaning staff to work at our restaurants in permanent and temporary jobs. Our restaurants are primarily placed in the city center of Copenhagen, and we offer full time and part time jobs for your flexibility.

If you are service minded and like to work in a busy kitchen as a keyworker, we might have the right job for you.

We offer

  • flexible working hours
  • good and safe employment conditions
  • planned schedule
  • competent and caring colleagues
  • employee benefits

We expect that you

  • some experience from other restaurants or commercial kitchens
  • have a valid working permit
  • are stable and show a positive attitude
  • can communicate in Danish or English

If you are interested, please send a few words about yourself along with your CV by following the link below.

We are looking forward to hear from you and welcome you to the Cofoco family.
